JobTitle: Software Engineer In Test – RAN Intelligence - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: Job DescriptionThe VMware Service Provider and Edge Business Unit (SEBU) provides a suite of products that enable the O-RAN architecture as well as provide a cloud platform for Telco operations. This empowers mobile operators with subscriber-level, radio access network (RAN) analytics, giving them better control of their 4G & 5G networks and maximizing the quality of service they can offer their customers. The RAN intelligence products correlate and enrich high volumes of streaming data from mobile network elements, in real-time, to provide unprecedented visibility.
